document_data.name: Dragomira Var
document_data.mainbody: '''Dragomira Var''' ({{Pronounce|DRAY|go|meer|uh|_|VARR|refs=}}) was a [[human]] [[gladiator]] that worked as a spy for the [[Zhentarim]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Dragomira had a rather feral demeanor and loathed [[dwarves]].{{Cite adventurers league/Blood Above, Blood Below|16-17}}
document_data.Possessions: Dragomira owned an elaborate suit of bone armor that she had crafted from the bones of her victims. She also owned a [[giant scorpion]] as a [[mount]] named [[Hook (character)|Hook]], whom she loved dearly.
document_data.History: In [[1490 DR]], Dragomira participated in an aquatic flag capture event in the [[Arena of Hillsfar]], during which she had to protect the flag of her raft, which represented the city of [[Thentia]].
